channel.title: Home on STARK
channel.description: Recent content in Home on STARK

item.title: Demo
item.description: Table of Contents Demo 2 Demo Video Screenshot Demo 1 Demo Video Interface Sketch Source code available at https://github.com/stark-cad/stark Further updates forthcoming… Demo 2 Demo Video Demonstrates graphics, a REPL, and keyboard controlled drawing / diagramming Screenshot Example of arbitrary line drawing by the user, in this case to display an impossible triangle Demo 1 Demo Video Shows Sail interpreter, basic graphics, and how they connect

item.title: Documentation
item.description: Rust Docs Autogenerated documentation for all Rust items of import in the source code. Sail Docs Upcoming documentation for syntax, types, special forms, and functions in Sail.
